scripts.book:build: npm run docs:prepare && del /S /Q _book && gitbook build
scripts.book:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m  "Update site"  && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am "Update site" && git push https://github.com/dalthviz/gitbook-showcase .git gh-pages --force
scripts.book:build-linux: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build
scripts.book:publish-linux: npm run docs:build-linux && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m  "Update site"  && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am "Update site" && git push https://github.com/dalthviz/gitbook-showcase.git gh-pages --force
